00001 /* bpred-pwl.cpp: Piecewise-Linear branch predictor [Jimenez, ISCA 2005] */
00002 /*
00003  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00004  */
00005 
00006 #include <math.h>
00007 #define COMPONENT_NAME "pwl"
00008 
00009 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00010 if(!strcasecmp(COMPONENT_NAME,type))
00011 {
00012   int l1_size; /* not in original paper: set to 1 for global history, > 1 for local history */
00013   int his_width; /* bhr history length */
00014   int top_size; /* top = Table of Perceptrons, i.e., the total number of perceptrons */
00015   int pc_bits; /* number of bits from the PC to use for the final selection */
00016 
00017   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d:%d:%d:%d",name,&l1_size,&his_width,&top_size,&pc_bits) != 5)
00018     fatal("bad bpred options string %s (should be \"pwl:name:l1_size:his_width:top_size:pc-bits\")",opt_string);
00019   return new bpred_pwl_t(name,l1_size,his_width,top_size,pc_bits);
00020 }
00021 #else
00022 
00023 
00024 class bpred_pwl_t:public bpred_dir_t
00025 {
00026 #define BIPOLAR(x) (((x)<<1)-1)
00027 //#define BIPOLAR(x) (2*(x)-1)
00028 
00029 #define MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH 128
00030 
00031   class bpred_pwl_sc_t:public bpred_sc_t
00032   {
00033     public:
00034     qword_t * bhr;
00035     qword_t lookup_bhr;
00036     md_addr_t lookup_path[MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH];
00037     md_addr_t lookup_PC;
00038     int sum;
00039   };
00040 
00041   protected:
00042 
00043   int pc_bits;
00044   int pc_mask;
00045 
00046   int bht_size;
00047   int bht_mask;
00048   qword_t * bht;
00049   int top_size;
00050   int top_mask;
00051   short **top; /* table of pwls */
00052   int weight_width;
00053   int weight_max;
00054   int weight_min;
00055   int theta;
00056 
00057   md_addr_t path[MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH];
00058   int path_head;
00059 
00060   int history_length;
00061   qword_t history_mask;
00062 
00063   public:
00064 
00065   /* CREATE */
00066   bpred_pwl_t(char * const arg_name,
00067               const int arg_bht_size,
00068               const int arg_history_length,
00069               const int arg_top_size,
00070               const int arg_pc_bits
00071              )
00072   {
00073     init();
00074 
00075     /* verify arguments are valid */
00076     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_bht_size);
00077     CHECK_NNEG(arg_history_length);
00078 
00079     name = strdup(arg_name);
00080     if(!name)
00081       fatal("couldn't malloc pwl name (strdup)");
00082     type = strdup(COMPONENT_NAME);
00083     if(!type)
00084       fatal("couldn't malloc pwl type (strdup)");
00085 
00086     pc_bits = arg_pc_bits;
00087     pc_mask = (1<<arg_pc_bits)-1;
00088     bht_size = arg_bht_size;
00089     bht_mask = arg_bht_size-1;
00090     history_length = arg_history_length;
00091     history_mask = (((qword_t)1)<<arg_history_length)-1;
00092 
00093     top_size = arg_top_size;
00094     top_mask = (1<<(int)(rint(ceil(log(arg_top_size)/log(2.0)))))-1;
00095 
00096     /* see Dan Jimenez's HPCA paper for these magic formulae */
00097     //theta = rint(floor(1.93*history_length + 14.0));
00098     theta = (int) rint(floor(2.14*(arg_history_length+1) + 20.58));
00099 
00100     /* if power of two, then actually need an extra bit to represent.
00101        also add one bit for the sign. */
00102     //if(theta == (1<<mylog2(theta)))
00103       //weight_width = mylog2(theta)+2;
00104     //else
00105       //weight_width = mylog2(theta)+1;
00106     weight_width = 8;
00107 
00108     weight_max = (1<<(weight_width-1))-1;
00109     weight_min = -(1<<(weight_width-1));
00110 
00111     bht = (qword_t*) calloc(bht_size,sizeof(*bht));
00112     if(!bht)
00113       fatal("couldn't malloc pwl BHT");
00114     top = (short**) calloc(top_size,sizeof(*top));
00115     if(!top)
00116       fatal("couldn't malloc pwl ToP");
00117     for(int i=0;i<top_size;i++)
00118     {
00119       top[i] = (short*) calloc(1+history_length,sizeof(*top[i]));
00120       if(!top[i])
00121         fatal("couldn't malloc pwl ToP entry");
00122     }
00123 
00124     memset(path,0,sizeof(*path)*MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH);
00125     path_head = 0;
00126 
00127     bits =  bht_size*history_length
00128          + top_size*(history_length+1)*weight_width
00129          + history_length*log_base2(top_size);
00130   }
00131 
00132   /* DESTROY */
00133   ~bpred_pwl_t()
00134   {
00135     for(int i=0;i<top_size;i++)
00136     {
00137       free(top[i]); top[i] = NULL;
00138     }
00139     free(top); top = NULL;
00140     free(bht); bht = NULL;
00141   }
00142 
00143   BPRED_LOOKUP_HEADER
00144   {
00145     class bpred_pwl_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_pwl_sc_t*) scvp;
00146     int l1index = PC&bht_mask;
00147     bool pred;
00148     int i;
00149 
00150     sc->bhr = &bht[l1index];
00151     sc->sum = top[(PC&top_mask)%top_size][0];
00152     for(i=0;i<history_length;i++)
00153     {
00154         int hist_dir = ((*sc->bhr >> i) & 1) ? 1:-1;
00155         md_addr_t addr = path[(path_head - i + MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH) % MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH];
00156         sc->sum += hist_dir * top[(((addr&top_mask)<<pc_bits)^(PC&pc_mask))%top_size][i+1];
00157     }
00158 
00159     pred = (sc->sum >= 0);
00160     sc->lookup_PC = PC;
00161     sc->lookup_bhr = *sc->bhr;
00162     for(i=0;i<history_length;i++)
00163     {
00164         sc->lookup_path[history_length-i-1] = path[(path_head - i + MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH)%MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH];
00165     }
00166 
00167     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00168     sc->updated = false;
00169 
00170     return pred;
00171   }
00172 
00173   /* UPDATE */
00174   BPRED_UPDATE_HEADER
00175   {
00176     class bpred_pwl_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_pwl_sc_t*) scvp;
00177     int i;
00178 
00179     if(!sc->updated)
00180     {
00181         BPRED_STAT(updates++;)
00182         BPRED_STAT(num_hits += our_pred == outcome;)
00183         sc->updated = true;
00184     }
00185 
00186     if(((sc->sum >= 0) != outcome) || ((sc->sum > -theta) && (sc->sum <theta)))
00187     {
00188         short * weight;
00189         weight = &top[(PC&top_mask)%top_size][0];
00190         if(outcome) {
00191             if(*weight < weight_max) ++*weight;
00192         } else {
00193             if(*weight > weight_min) --*weight;
00194         }
00195 
00196         for(i=0;i<history_length;i++)
00197         {
00198           md_addr_t addr = sc->lookup_path[history_length-1-i];
00199           weight = &top[(((addr&top_mask)<<pc_bits)^(PC&pc_mask))%top_size][i+1];
00200           if( ((sc->lookup_bhr>>i)&1) == (unsigned)outcome ) {
00201               if(*weight < weight_max) ++*weight;
00202           } else {
00203               if(*weight > weight_min) --*weight;
00204           }
00205         }
00206     }
00207 
00208   }
00209 
00210   /* SPEC_UPDATE */
00211   BPRED_SPEC_UPDATE_HEADER
00212   {
00213     class bpred_pwl_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_pwl_sc_t*) scvp;
00214     BPRED_STAT(spec_updates++;)
00215 
00216     *sc->bhr = ((*sc->bhr<<1)|outcome)&history_mask;
00217     path_head = modinc(path_head,MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH); //(path_head + 1) % MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH;
00218     path[path_head] = PC;
00219   }
00220 
00221   /* RECOVER */
00222   BPRED_RECOVER_HEADER
00223   {
00224     class bpred_pwl_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_pwl_sc_t*) scvp;
00225     int i;
00226     *sc->bhr = (sc->lookup_bhr<<1)|outcome;
00227     for(i=0;i<history_length;i++)
00228         path[i] = sc->lookup_path[i];
00229     path_head = history_length-1;
00230 
00231     path_head = modinc(path_head,MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH); //(path_head + 1) % MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH;
00232     path[path_head] = sc->lookup_PC;
00233   }
00234 
00235   /* FLUSH */
00236   BPRED_FLUSH_HEADER
00237   {
00238     class bpred_pwl_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_pwl_sc_t*) scvp;
00239     int i;
00240     *sc->bhr = sc->lookup_bhr;
00241     for(i=0;i<history_length;i++)
00242       path[i] = sc->lookup_path[i];
00243     path_head = history_length-1;
00244   }
00245 
00246   /* REG_STATS */
00247   BPRED_REG_STATS_HEADER
00248   {
00249     bpred_dir_t::reg_stats(sdb,core);
00250 
00251     int id = core?core->current_thread->id:0;
00252     char buf[256];
00253     char buf2[256];
00254 
00255     sprintf(buf,"c%d.%s.threshold",id,name);
00256     sprintf(buf2,"%s training threshold",type);
00257     stat_reg_int(sdb, true, buf, buf2, &theta, theta, NULL);
00258     sprintf(buf,"c%d.%s.weight_width",id,name);
00259     sprintf(buf2,"%s weight/counter width in bits",type);
00260     stat_reg_int(sdb, true, buf, buf2, &weight_width, weight_width, NULL);
00261   }
00262 
00263   /* GET_CACHE */
00264   BPRED_GET_CACHE_HEADER
00265   {
00266     class bpred_pwl_sc_t * sc = new bpred_pwl_sc_t();
00267     if(!sc)
00268       fatal("couldn't malloc pwl State Cache");
00269     return sc;
00270   }
00271 
00272 };
